items.title: Negotiations over US-UK tech deal stall
items.description: When the partnership was unveiled in September the UK government said it would "shape the futures of millions of people"

items.title: Erratic Newcastle give Howe 'horrible feeling'
items.description: Newcastle United head coach Eddie Howe says it is a "horrible feeling" to not know what he is going to get from his side.

items.title: Thousands of drivers wrongly fined for speeding since 2021
items.description: An anomaly identified by National Highways caused thousands of incorrect speed camera activations.

items.title: Who are the shooting victims?
items.description: Authorities say two rabbis, a Holocaust survivor and a 10-year-old girl were among the victims.

items.title: BBC says it will defend Trump defamation lawsuit over Panorama speech edit
items.description: The US president has requested $5bn (Â£3.7bn) in damages, according to court documents filed in Florida.
